FAQS

Frequently asked questions about AI video.

How can I test Synthesia?

Free AI video: You can generate an AI video for free here.

‍Free product tour: You can watch a free 5 minute product tour here.

‍Free sales demo: If you’re interested in testing Synthesia for a larger Enterprise, you can book a personal demo with our sales team here.

What happens if I go over my plan’s monthly limit?

If you exceed your limit, your usage will be capped until renewal. To get more video minutes right away, you can upgrade your plan.

Can I see more customer reviews of Synthesia?

Yes, of course. We've been selected as a High Performer on G2 and you can read the reviews here.

We work hard every day to improve and make Synthesia even more awesome in the future. You can also see our frequent product updates here.

Do unused video minutes roll over into the next month?

No. If you are under your video credit limit at the end of a billing period, the unused videos do not roll over to the next billing period.

Can I cancel Synthesia at any time?

Yes. Simply go to your account settings in Synthesia and cancel your plan.

Can I upgrade my account at any time?

Yes. If you wish to upgrade your Starter or Creator plan to an annual plan, please get in touch with customer support. If you wish to upgrade to an Enterprise plan please contact our sales team.

How much does Synthesia cost?

For Starter plan users, Synthesia costs $29 per month or $264 if you go with an annual plan.

For Creator plan users, Synthesia costs $89/month or $804/year if you pay annually.

Can I use Synthesia for free?

You can try Synthesia out for free by going to the free AI video page. There, you can choose a video template, type in your video script, and generate a video for free.

Is Synthesia a one-time payment?

No, the payment for using Synthesia is recurring. For Starter and Creator plan users, the billing cycle can be monthly or annually. For Enterprise customers the billing cycle is annual.

How much is a custom avatar?

One custom personal avatar is included with the annual Starter and Creator plans. Enterprise plans include unlimited personal avatars (Subject to fair use).

How many videos can I make with a Starter Plan?

A starter plan provides you with 10 video minutes per month. The amount of videos you generate depends on the length of each video you generate.

Here are some examples:

  • If you generate a video which is 0:59 minutes long, you will have another 9:01 minutes of video left to generate for the month.
  • You can generate 10 videos which are 1:00 minutes long, or 1 video which is 10:00 minutes long.

How and when are video minutes consumed?

Video minutes are only consumed when a video has been generated. For as long as your video is in draft, or you are utilising the play functionality credits will not be consumed.

If you have generated your video and would like to update the content you are able to do so by editing and regenerating your video.

‍Please note: We only count new video seconds. Example: If you edit an existing 1-minute video and change 3 seconds of it, we will only charge you for 3 seconds.

Can I pay per video?

No. Synthesia is based on monthly and yearly subscriptions.

Ready to try our AI video platform?

Join over 1M+ users today and start making AI videos with 230+ avatars in 140+ languages.

Using AI, we’re radically changing the process of video content creation, making it scalable and affordable while maintaining high quality.
